author: parithosh
content:
Have EL teams started work on eth/70? 
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7542

author: .fjl
content: <@199561711278227457> This EIP is withdrawn. We implemented eth/69 instead, which has a similar announcement of the available history range. AFAIK eth/69 is implemented by all clients at this point.
